context_descript: Ways you will need to relate to people on the job.
How much do you need to contact other people? (Contact might take place in person, by phone, or in other ways.)
Do you need to lead others or coordinate their work?
Do you need to deal with customers or the public?

new_context: Dealing with People Who Are Physical Threats
context_descript: How often do you deal with people who could threaten harm or cause harm to you or others?

orig_context: Deal With Unpleasant or Angry People
new_context: Dealing with Angry or Rude People
context_descript: How often do you deal with rude or angry people?
How often do you use email on the job?
How often do you talk to people or teams in person?
How often do you deal with conflict?
How often do you write letters or memos on the job?
How often do you need to speak in front of groups, or give public talks?
Are you in charge of how well other workers do their jobs? Are you judged on the results?

orig_context: Responsible for Others' Health and Safety
new_context: Judged for Health and Safety of Others
context_descript: Are you in charge of the health and safety of others? Are you judged on the results?
How often do you need to talk on the phone?

orig_context: Work With Work Group or Team
context_descript: Do you need to work with others in a group or team?
Ways you will need to use your body on the job.
How often do you work in small, tight spaces? How often do you need to be in awkward positions?
How often are you around pollutants or toxins? Those might include dirt, gas, dust, poisons, or smells.
How often are you around diseases or germs that might infect you?
How often do you need to work in risky conditions? How often do you face danger?
How often do you work around dangerous equipment? How often do you use it?
How often do you need to work in high places?

orig_context: Exposed to Minor Burns, Cuts, Bites, or Stings
new_context: Minor Burns, Cuts, Bites, or Stings
context_descript: How often do you risk getting minor burns, cuts, bites, or stings?
How often do you work with radiation, or near it?
How often do you work in settings or use tools that shake your whole body?

new_context: Very Bright or Very Low Light
context_descript: How often do you work in very bright or very dark places?

orig_context: In an Enclosed Vehicle or Equipment
context_descript: How often do you work in an enclosed vehicle or equipment? That might include a car or truck.

orig_context: In an Open Vehicle or Equipment
context_descript: How often do you work in an open vehicle or equipment? That might include a tractor.
How often do you work indoors in a place with proper heating and cooling?
How often do you work indoors in a place without proper heating or cooling? That might include a warehouse without heat.
How often do you work outdoors, in open weather? Weather might include rain, snow, heat, and more.
How often do you work outdoors, under cover? That might include under a roof with no walls.
How often do you need to work close to other people?

orig_context: Sounds, Noise Levels Are Distracting or Uncomfortable
context_descript: How often do you work in noisy, distracting settings? How often do you work around sounds that bother your ears?

orig_context: Spend Time Bending or Twisting the Body
context_descript: How much do you need to bend or twist your body on the job?

orig_context: Spend Time Climbing Ladders, Scaffolds, or Poles
context_descript: How much time do you spend climbing ladders, scaffolds, or poles?

orig_context: Spend Time Keeping or Regaining Balance
context_descript: How much time do you spend keeping or getting back your balance?

orig_context: Spend Time Kneeling, Crouching, Stooping, or Crawling
context_descript: How much time do you spend kneeling, crouching, bending, or crawling?
How much time do you spend making repeated motions?
How much time do you spend sitting?
How much time do you spend standing?

orig_context: Spend Time Using Your Hands to Handle, Control, or Feel Objects, Tools, or Controls
context_descript: How much do you use your hands to hold, control, or feel objects, tools, or controls?
How much time do you spend walking and running?

new_context: Very Hot or Very Cold Temperatures
context_descript: How often do you work when it's very hot or very cold?

orig_context: Wear Common Protective or Safety Equipment such as Safety Shoes, Glasses, Gloves, Hearing Protection, Hard Hats, or Life Jackets
new_context: Wearing Common Safety Equipment or Gear
context_descript: How much do you wear common equipment or gear to protect yourself? Gear might include safety shoes, glasses, gloves or hard hats.

orig_context: Wear Specialized Protective or Safety Equipment such as Breathing Apparatus, Safety Harness, Full Protection Suits, or Radiation Protection
new_context: Wearing Special Safety Equipment or Gear
context_descript: How often do you wear special equipment or gear to protect yourself? Gear might include harnesses, breathing masks, or safety suits.
The rules and structure of the job and workplace.
How serious are the effects of mistakes on the job? How bad would the result be if a worker made a mistake that couldn’t be quickly fixed?
How much work is done by hand? How much of the work is done by machines, robots, or computers?
How many hours are worked in one week?
Can you make choices on your own without checking with your boss?
How often do you make important choices?

orig_context: Impact of Decisions on Co-workers or Company Results
context_descript: How serious are the results of your choices? How much do they affect others?

orig_context: Importance of Being Exact or Accurate
context_descript: Do you need to be very exact or accurate in this job?
How often do you need to repeat the same tasks without stopping?
Do you have to compete with others? Do you have to be aware of others competing with you?

orig_context: Pace Determined by Speed of Equipment
new_context: Keeping Pace with Speed of Equipment
context_descript: Do you need to keep pace with the speed of equipment or machines on this job? (This does not mean that you are busy at all times.)
Do you have to follow set rules or a set structure? Or can you set your own tasks and goals?
How often do you need to meet strict deadlines?
Do the hours set for the job stay the same?
